file_content.text: I thought I made it clear I don't want to talk to you. Go get yourself killed.
This is a camp for warriors, not hikers. You aren't welcome here.
I'm here at the request of Mandalore.
Your boss sent me.
And you are...?
Pick a fight with someone who cares.
Whatever.
You'll care when you're wearing my knife in your guts. Leave, I'm not telling you again.
Warriors, huh? Guess that makes you the armor polisher.
You're just a little punk.
Bite your tongue or lose it. I'm done being nice.
He's more warrior than you, Jogo.
She's more warrior than you, Jogo.
You're one to judge, eh, arue'tal?
Huntmaster declared her Grand Champion.
Huntmaster declared him Grand Champion.
That true?
It is, and you're standing between me and my next target.
Yes, now step aside.
He's not mistaken.
You're right, I don't. And I sure as hell don't have to like you tramping all over our hunting grounds.
You don't want me to prove it. Trust me.
Back off before you get hurt.
Yeah? What if I do?
Winning the Great Hunt doesn't make you one of us.
Finish up whatever brought you here and go.
Never mind. It's an honor.
There's something nasty out here I need to kill.
Where do I find the monster?
I know what you're after.
Nice to meet you too, kid. You got a name?
Likewise.
Torian Cadera. Not a kid.
I need to know about this cavern, Torian.
You know this cave well?
Hot, humid, dark. Full of monsters.
Didn't mean to offend.
No insult taken.
You don't look a day over eighteen.
You're still young.
We gauge by deeds.
Your friend's talking himself into an early grave.
That punk has a death wish.
He's like that.
Taking the head of one of our beasts?
What can you tell me about the creatures you're hunting?
What are the beasts?
Sithspawn, we think. Abominations. They die all the same... eventually.
Probably just the young. There's worse further down there.
I'm here to claim the head of something. I'll know what when I find it.
Something like that.
I hunt in a different league, kid.
I'm after bigger game.
I get it.
The sire of the brood.
No one's seen it, but it's there. You can feel its heartbeat in the walls.
Better warriors than you have tried. They never returned.
I don't want any of you in my way down there, got it?
Stay out of the cavern.
Understood.
Then let me show you how it's done.
Just watch and learn.
If you're still here when I get back from killing this thing, you're next.
I'm going to kill you, Jogo.
I can rest easy, then. Die well if you can.
Ori'buyce, kih'kovid....
If there's a bottom, it's probably there. Good hunting.
